ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 18 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Canon Speedlite 320EX Flash + <4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<5> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E12 + <7> 58mm UV Filter + <8> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters +
<9> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> Canon 2400 DSLR Camera Case + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <13> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<14> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <15> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <16> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower + <17> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <18> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Zoom Lens + Speedlite 320EX Flash + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Tele/Wide Lenses Kit
